environment.description: This pattern captures the mention of cleanliness or lack thereof in the context of an environment.
This pattern detects sentences that describe the ambiance, atmosphere, or overall feeling of an environment.

price.description: This pattern captures the mention of a specific price or pricing detail.
This pattern detects when 'price' is compared to something else, indicating a value judgment.

products.description: Words like 'bbq ribs', 'chicken biscuit', 'ravioli', indicating food or menu items.

service.description: Pattern captures expressions of satisfaction, friendliness, helpfulness, and related positive emotions associated with service.
